complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks such as setting up Electron-specific build processes, configuring auto-updater functionality, updating the CI/CD pipeline for Electron, creating cross-platform installation packages, and testing the deployment on all target platforms.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: The task involves multiple complex components including migration from Tauri to Electron, setting up build processes, configuring auto-updater, and ensuring cross-platform compatibility. Each of these components requires specialized knowledge and careful testing, indicating a high complexity. Breaking it down into subtasks will help manage the workload and ensure thorough completion.
